titleStmt.title: Every mans case, or A brotherly support to Mr. VVill. Larner, prisoner in the New-Prison in Mayden-Lane, London. Also, another letter from a prisoner, to Mr. Larner.
titleStmt.author: J. M.

notesStmt.note: The second letter is signed on page 7: J.M.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
